评论详情: Cheap and tangled. No clear instructions on how to use. I went back to look at my order and the photos of my purchase are gone.
It’ll look cute when worn but don’t stress it out. The leather looks like it could tear easily. It’s very thin.

I have had this for months and took it out to try it on and oh boy. The straps are not connected and do not seem to match up. It is just random straps with buckles. It will in no way look like the image
Comparable to cardboard not anything like leather.

I have tried other harnesses that claim to be plus size friendly but aren't. I am a 38-40" waist and this one fits with a lot of room (at least 8-9 more holes on the strap). It looks to be good quality and looks great! I love that the arm holes are adjustable too.

States it’s over 50 inches. I have a 39” waste and a busty chest. Did not fit by 5 inches. So uncomfortable Came wadded up in packaging, was pretty confusing to figure shape out. Cheap material. Not sturdy material or buckles

评论概述: A little hard trying to put it on
评论详情: Good quality and looks like the picture, I’m a 3x and it fit perfectly, only thing is that it was a little frustrating trying to put it on and it didn’t come with instructions
It is made out of the exact material you would expect for an inexpensive harness from Amazon. I am 2x/3x and if my measurements are right, you could totally fit if youre a few sizes bigger than me!
obvi not leather, but not even a good imitation

评论概述: Not bad, especially for the price!
评论详情: It’s better than I expected for under $20. Straps are approximately an inch wide, material is pliable and not at all rigid. It’s nothing sturdy but quite acceptable for fashion use and comfortable. It’s got room to spare (10” plus extra on the waist straps and I’m a size 18/20). I’m going to glue the strap keepers in place because they slide freely but other than that no complaints, I would recommend.
